description: This file defines the AzureOpenAI class, a data class that extends OpenAILike, providing methods to configure and instantiate Azure OpenAI clients (both synchronous and asynchronous). It manages environment variables, client parameters, and client creation logic for Azure OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: AzureOpenAI
classes.description: A data class representing an Azure OpenAI chat model, with methods to configure and retrieve OpenAI clients.

methods.name: _get_client_params
methods.description: Constructs and returns a dictionary of parameters for creating an AzureOpenAI client, including environment variable fallbacks.

methods.name: get_client
methods.description: Returns an instance of the AzureOpenAIClient, creating it if necessary and if not already closed.

methods.name: get_async_client
methods.description: Returns an asynchronous AzureOpenAIClient, creating it if necessary, with a custom HTTP client if not provided.
